name: trackEvents(matching:timeout:mode:handler:)
desc: Tracks events that match the specified mask using the specified tracking handler until the tracking handler explicitly terminates tracking.
declaration:
func trackEvents(matching mask: NSEvent.EventTypeMask, 
         timeout: TimeInterval, 
            mode: RunLoop.Mode, 
         handler trackingHandler: (NSEvent?, UnsafeMutablePointer<ObjCBool>) -> Void)
